title: WHIRR-760
body:
allow other sudoers access
allow password ssh access
configure all systems against the private ip address

title: hadoop 1.0.4 has been moved to archive, change the url for hadoop default property
body: hadoop 1.0.4 has been moved to archive, change the default url to the correct one, otherwise, the deployment without override the hadoop tarball url will fail.

repo.name: whirr
repo.description: Forked from Apache Whirr for Development

title: Cassandra version bump
body: This version of cassandra no longer seems to be in the repositiories mentioned.

title: Updated Cassandra to 1.0.6
body:
- Updated the url to the Cassandra tarball.
- Changed the JMX port to 7199, which has changed since 0.8 from 8080.
- Changed the clustername directive in cassandra.yaml

Passes 'mvn test' and also successfully spawns a 1.0.6 cluster.

title: hadoop-proxy.sh is now made executable. Solves WHIRR-439
(WHIRR-349 partial solution) Use file rather than inputstream when using the blobstore.
body:
This allows jclouds to retry the upload when something went wrong.
Added testcase with slightly larger content (1MB) for uploading

title: Branch 0.5 - support for CDH3u0 HBase
body:
I've udpated the cdh services scripts and ZooKeeperClusterActionHandler.java to properly work with CDH3 when setting up an HBase cluster. Tested multiple times with 1 master + 1 region and also 1 master + 5 region on EC2.

The only issue I ran into was previously documented in https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HBASE-1960 where the HBase Master shuts down after only one attempt to access DFS. This is something that should be addressed by the HBase team or a fix integrated by Cloudera into CDH.
